version_description:
New update with some much needed fixes:
Removed the Facebook brigade system. Added a new brigade system. ALL THE BRIGADES HAVE BEEN RESET.
If you have any brigade issues please contact our support.
New Map layouts: 9 new fight locations.
Shooting through walls fix.
Added Replay Kit. You can now record your gameplay.

This app has been updated by Apple to use the latest Apple signing certificate.

We fixed visual problems showing up on iOS11.

We fixed visual problems showing up on iOS11.
